key_decisions.decision: Skill targets AI agents as consumers, not humans
key_decisions.rationale: User wants to generate artifacts that AI will execute, not human-readable documentation
User has specific preferences for how AI artifacts should be structured

key_decisions.decision: Core philosophy identified: Story-driven, Purpose-over-Role, Background-as-differentiator, Explicit-steps, Localized-constraints
key_decisions.rationale: Analysis of user's existing artifacts (blog posts, skills, commands) reveals consistent patterns

key_decisions.decision: Full coverage across three areas: Single-task prompts, Iterative loops, User prompt formatting
key_decisions.rationale: User confirmed all three areas are needed, not prioritized depth in one

key_decisions.decision: System prompt = static; User prompt = dynamic context assembly
key_decisions.rationale: User clarified the key pattern: static system prompt paired with dynamically formatted user prompt

key_decisions.decision: User prompt uses modular formatters with semantic XML tags
key_decisions.rationale: Observed in production code: format_*_context() functions, sliding window, directive injection

key_decisions.decision: Automatic invocation: triggers when writing any AI-consumable artifact
key_decisions.rationale: User wants this to apply to prompts, workflows, subcommands—anything sent to an AI

key_decisions.decision: Dual output format: Python for user prompts, Markdown+XML for system prompts/workflows
key_decisions.rationale: User does LLM work in Python; user prompts are functions (state→string), system prompts are Markdown

key_decisions.decision: Templates with principles + real examples, NOT fill-in-the-blank TODOs
key_decisions.rationale: User prefers generic templates that explain principles and link to real examples

key_decisions.decision: Three areas: Single-task, Workflow (agentic), Iterative loop (user-in-loop)
key_decisions.rationale: User refined the distinction: single-task is one-off, workflow is multi-step agentic, iterative is interactive with user input each cycle
User wants single source of truth - reference real examples in their existing locations

key_decisions.decision: Progressive disclosure within skill for area routing
key_decisions.rationale: Top-level skill triggers on prompt writing, then model decides which area based on context
User confirmed 'don't use generic roles' as first anti-pattern, more to be added

high_level: Enable Claude to generate production-quality AI artifacts in user's opinionated style
Codify methodology so it's reproducible without manual enforcement
Cover full spectrum of artifact types for AI system development
mid_level: Area 1: Single-task prompts (one-off, programmatic, single completion)
Area 2: Workflow prompts (multi-step agentic, agent drives itself)
Area 3: Iterative loop prompts (user-in-the-loop, interview style)
Cross-cutting: User prompt formatting (Python functions for dynamic context)
